remarks: The ordering of an image structure.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2015.)
statement:
imasbas.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) $.
imasbas.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) $.
imasbas.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) $.
imasbas.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) $.
imasle.n $e |- N = ( le ` R ) $.
imasle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` U ) $.
imasle $p |- ( ph -> .<_ = ( ( F o. N ) o. `' F ) ) $.
